languages.text: "После катастрофы Лилэтан дал моим собратьям убежище — приют на руинах наших предков, под сенью лесов, сотворенных мудростью наших миропевцев... в соседстве с вами, столь грубо пожинающими плоды наших трудов".

traits.locale_text: "После катастрофы Лилэтан дал моим собратьям убежище — приют на руинах наших предков, под сенью лесов, сотворенных мудростью наших миропевцев... в соседстве с вами, столь грубо пожинающими плоды наших трудов".

languages.text: "After the calamity, the Lilaethan offered my kin a sanctuary — a place of respite in the ruins of our ancestors, under the canopy of the forests created by the wisdom of our Worldsingers... living alongside your kind, who reap the fruits of our labour with such vulgarity."
languages.original_text: "После катастрофы Лилэтан дал моим собратьям убежище — приют на руинах наших предков, под сенью лесов, сотворенных мудростью наших миропевцев... в соседстве с вами, столь грубо пожинающими плоды наших трудов".

traits.locale_text: "After the calamity, the Lilaethan offered my kin a sanctuary — a place of respite in the ruins of our ancestors, under the canopy of the forests created by the wisdom of our Worldsingers... living alongside your kind, who reap the fruits of our labor with such vulgarity."

"After the calamity, the Lilaethan offered my kin a sanctuary — a place of respite in the ruins of our ancestors, under the canopy of the forests created by the wisdom of our Worldsingers... living alongside your kind, who reap the fruits of our labor with such vulgarity."

"After the calamity, the Lilaethan offered my kin a sanctuary — a place of respite in the ruins of our ancestors, under the canopy of the forests created by the wisdom of our Worldsingers... living alongside your kind, who reap the fruits of our labour with such vulgarity."

languages.text: 「災厄の後、リラエタンは我らの同胞に与えたのは聖域だった――私達の祖先の遺跡にある休養を目的とした場所で、林冠に覆われている。ワールドシンガーの知性の賜物…だが、人間、すなわち我らの労働成果を刈り取る低俗な種族と一緒に暮らしている」
languages.original_text: "After the calamity, the Lilaethan offered my kin a sanctuary — a place of respite in the ruins of our ancestors, under the canopy of the forests created by the wisdom of our Worldsingers... living alongside your kind, who reap the fruits of our labour with such vulgarity."

traits.locale_text: 「災厄の後、リラエタンは我らの同胞に与えたのは聖域だった――私達の祖先の遺跡にある休養を目的とした場所で、林冠に覆われている。ワールドシンガーの知性の賜物…だが、人間、すなわち我らの労働成果を刈り取る低俗な種族と一緒に暮らしている」

languages.text: “那场灾难过后，莉莱赞为我的族人提供了避难所。我们在我们祖先的废墟中，在咏世者们依靠智慧创造的森林树冠下……与你们的族群生活在一起，而你们却使用如此粗鄙的方式，收割着我们的劳动成果。”
languages.original_text: "After the calamity, the Lilaethan offered my kin a sanctuary — a place of respite in the ruins of our ancestors, under the canopy of the forests created by the wisdom of our Worldsingers... living alongside your kind, who reap the fruits of our labour with such vulgarity."

traits.locale_text: “那场灾难过后，莉莱赞为我的族人提供了避难所。我们在我们祖先的废墟中，在咏世者们依靠智慧创造的森林树冠下……与你们的族群生活在一起，而你们却使用如此粗鄙的方式，收割着我们的劳动成果。”

languages.text: «Después de la calamidad, el Lilaethan ofreció santuario a los míos, un lugar de descanso entre las ruinas de nuestros antepasados, bajo el dosel de los bosques creados por la sabiduría de nuestras aedas de mundos... viviendo entre los tuyos, que cosechan los frutos de nuestra labor con tanta vulgaridad».
languages.original_text: "After the calamity, the Lilaethan offered my kin a sanctuary — a place of respite in the ruins of our ancestors, under the canopy of the forests created by the wisdom of our Worldsingers... living alongside your kind, who reap the fruits of our labour with such vulgarity."

traits.locale_text: «Después de la calamidad, el Lilaethan ofreció santuario a los míos, un lugar de descanso entre las ruinas de nuestros antepasados, bajo el dosel de los bosques creados por la sabiduría de nuestras aedas de mundos... viviendo entre los tuyos, que cosechan los frutos de nuestra labor con tanta vulgaridad».

languages.text: "Nach dem Unglück bot Lileath den Meinen eine Zuflucht an – einen Ort der Ruhe in den Ruinen unserer Ahnen, unter dem Blätterdach der Wälder, die die Weisheit unserer Weltensänger erschaffen hat ... zwischen Euresgleichen, die Ihr die Früchte unserer Arbeit ohne jede Anerkennung erntet."
languages.original_text: "After the calamity, the Lilaethan offered my kin a sanctuary — a place of respite in the ruins of our ancestors, under the canopy of the forests created by the wisdom of our Worldsingers... living alongside your kind, who reap the fruits of our labour with such vulgarity."

traits.locale_text: "Nach dem Unglück bot Lileath den Meinen eine Zuflucht an – einen Ort der Ruhe in den Ruinen unserer Ahnen, unter dem Blätterdach der Wälder, die die Weisheit unserer Weltensänger erschaffen hat ... zwischen Euresgleichen, die Ihr die Früchte unserer Arbeit ohne jede Anerkennung erntet."

languages.text: « Après la catastrophe, la lilaethan a offert un sanctuaire à mes semblables : un lieu de répit parmi les ruines de nos ancêtres, sous la canopée des forêts créées par la sagesse de nos Chante-mondes... Nous vivions parmi les vôtres, tandis que vous profitiez des fruits de notre labeur avec une terrible vulgarité. »
languages.original_text: "After the calamity, the Lilaethan offered my kin a sanctuary — a place of respite in the ruins of our ancestors, under the canopy of the forests created by the wisdom of our Worldsingers... living alongside your kind, who reap the fruits of our labour with such vulgarity."

traits.locale_text: « Après la catastrophe, la lilaethan a offert un sanctuaire à mes semblables : un lieu de répit parmi les ruines de nos ancêtres, sous la canopée des forêts créées par la sagesse de nos Chante-mondes... Nous vivions parmi les vôtres, tandis que vous profitiez des fruits de notre labeur avec une terrible vulgarité. »

languages.text: "Lilaethan; felaketin ardından hısımlarıma sığınak, atalarımızın harabelerinde Dünya Ezgicilerimizin hikmetiyle yaratılan ormanların gölgesi altında korunak oldu. Emeğimizin meyvelerini hoyratça toplayan türünle birlikte yaşıyorlardı."
languages.original_text: "After the calamity, the Lilaethan offered my kin a sanctuary — a place of respite in the ruins of our ancestors, under the canopy of the forests created by the wisdom of our Worldsingers... living alongside your kind, who reap the fruits of our labour with such vulgarity."

traits.locale_text: "Lilaethan; felaketin ardından hısımlarıma sığınak, atalarımızın harabelerinde Dünya Ezgicilerimizin hikmetiyle yaratılan ormanların gölgesi altında korunak oldu. Emeğimizin meyvelerini hoyratça toplayan türünle birlikte yaşıyorlardı."
